name: BrickBat
description:
Do you like old games with paddles?  How about ALL of the games with paddles?

This was an old app I made to be fast and easy to put out, nothing more, nothing less.  You control everything with the mouse.

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
